    Reference

    DS models

    Democratic spaces models. These are wrappers around the base models specific to the democratic spaces project.

    ds_logistic_reg()

    Logistic regression

    ds_logistic_reg_featx()

    Logistic regression with feature extraction

    ds_reg_logreg()

    Reguarized logistic regression

    Base models

    Generic models with wrappers so that the main arguments are x and y.

    logistic_reg()

    Logistic regression

    logistic_reg_featx()

    Logistic regression with feature extraction

    reg_logreg()

    Reguarized logistic regression
